alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 4:56AM CDT until June 29 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Jefferson County in southeastern Nebraska... Central Gage County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 456 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jansen, or 6 miles northeast of Fairbury, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Harbine around 505 AM CDT. Plymouth around 510 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Beatrice and Pickrell. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
